summary: This document appears to be an email thread from January 2023 between attorney Brad Edwards and an unnamed individual (likely a victim or witness). The email discusses coordination of subpoenas and case plans between Edwards and the US Virgin Islands (USVI) in litigation against JP Morgan, and includes a reference to flight bookings purchased on behalf of JE (Jeffrey Epstein).

keyFacts: Brad Edwards, an attorney, is coordinating subpoenas and case plans with the US Virgin Islands in litigation against JP Morgan.
Cathy and Miles Alexander have been subpoenaed in the USVI case and were present during alleged trafficking events.
An unnamed individual offers to testify and provides flight bookings purchased on behalf of JE (Jeffrey Epstein).
The email indicates evidence sharing between the USVI case and the victims' case against JP Morgan.
The correspondence suggests ongoing legal actions in early 2023 related to Epstein's trafficking network and financial enablers.
